resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81489</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81489</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9383</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Food and Drink in Nursery Rhymes</string>
            <string language="es">Comida y bebidas en canciones populares</string>
            <string language="ga">Bia agus Deoch i Rainn do Pháistí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung und Getränk in den Baumschule Reimen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nourriture et boisson dans des comptines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alimento e bebida em rimas de berçário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alimento e bevanda nelle rime di scuola materna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρόφιμα και ποτό στους έμμετρους λόγους βρεφικών 
σταθμών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will enjoy the challenge of remembering which nursery rhyme is being referred to in this quiz.  It will test their long term memory.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños disfrutarán del reto de recordar a qué canción infantil se refiere este cuestionario. Comprobará su memoria a largo plazo.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bainfidh leanaí taitneamh as an dúshlán a bhaineann le cuimhneamh ar ainm an rann dá dtagraítear dó sa cheist. Tástálfaidh sé a gcuimhne fadtréimhseach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder genießen die Herausforderung des 
Erinnerns, an welcher Baumschule Reim in diesem Quiz angesprochen 
wird. Er prüft ihren langen Bezeichnung Speicher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants apprécieront le défi de se rappeler
quelle comptine est mentionnée à ce jeu. Elle testera leur 
mémoire à long terme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças apreciarão o desafio de recordar 
que rima de berçário está sendo consultada neste quiz. 
Testará sua memória a longo prazo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini godranno la sfida di ricordarsi del 
quale rima di scuola materna sta riferendosi a in questo quiz. 
Verificherà la loro memoria di lunga durata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα απολαύσουν την πρόκληση της ανάμνησης 
ποιου έμμετρος λόγος βρεφικών σταθμών αναφέρεται σε αυτόν τον 
διαγωνισμό γνώσεων. Θα εξετάσει τη μακροπρόθεσμη μνήμη 
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
